document_data.name: The Hand
document_data.mainbody:
'''The Hand''' was a bar in [[Myratma]].

It was an old bar, in existence since during the [[Shoon Imperium]]. The central support column of the building was actually a petrified [[human]] male who had attempted to assassinate [[Shoon IV]].<ref>
